entry.title: Sunday: Chance of showers. High 16. POP 30%
entry.summary: Sunny near noon then a mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of showers this afternoon. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 early this afternoon. High 16. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Sunday 08 May 2016
